name: Nostalgic-Memories
author: Anubi
description:
a
 spin-off of Nostalgic-Dreams (another palette of mine) with more shades
 and new values across all 12 different colors, equipped with Blue/Gray,
 Red/Yellow and Green shades, reminiscent of some great memories of the 
past. Not really a sequel to Nostalgic-Dreams, but more so as its own 
thing. Featured in the 12th of May of 2023 as a limitation for a Pixel 
Dailies theme (Bun).
